Title: Evacuation Notice
Text: To all villagers and stationed personnel of the investigation area: There have been reports of sightings of abnormal frequencies in areas surrounding the village (including the ninth investigation area). The Huaxu Academy estimates a build-up of Etheric Sea, and a high probability of Tacet Field occurrence in these areas. To ensure the safety of your life and/or properties, please prepare for an immediate evacuation upon receiving this notice. Gather essential items only. Midnight Rangers will be dispatched to assist with evacuation. REPEAT. ESSENTIAL ITEMS ONLY. EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY! Additional Instructions: All stationed personnel of the investigation area must pay close attention to subsequent alerts/notices.
